Author: steph_5631
Text: its tricky, cuz im just getting to know  my bfs mom and she opened up and was accpeting then i  guess  haha i was a safe person. so idk i was like not ok to deal with somoene so deep in a ed. then like my friend dumped it all on me yesterday and started competing. but whatever i give up on realtionships and friends. :/ ofc i have to work it out with my bfs mom. because I see myself marrying him. I had just been putting off getting close to his famliy for way to long because of anxiety. :/ so ill probably just suck it up. ty for ur reply

Author: SpottedRocks
Text: If you feel unable to talk to them, maybe you could ask your boyfriend (or best friend?) to let them know that certain behaviours make it difficult for you to manage your illness?  Or write the people you know a short message and prepare one to give to people you don't know that well that lets them know it hurts you?  Anyone that is your friend and any remotely kind person should have no problem with this.
